gurmukhi.Dr. Ganda Singh: drimAwin bzim mw juz ik¤swie jwnwnw nIsq [

Pritpal Singh Bindra.translation: My heart is charred because of my separation from my beloved,

Dr. Ganda Singh.translation: ਸਾਡੀ ਮਹਫਲ ਵਿਚ ਤਾਣ ਬਿਨਾ ਪ੍ਰੀਤਮ ਦੇ ਹੋਰ ਕਿਸੇ ਦੀ ਕਥਾ ਕਹਾਣੀ ਨਹੀਣ ਹੁੰਦੀ ।

gurmukhi.Dr. Ganda Singh: by hjwb Aw AMdrIx mjils ik ks bygwnw nIsq [10[1[

Pritpal Singh Bindra.translation: And my life and spirit are ablaze and reduced to ashes (in memory of) for my handsome master. (14) (1)

Dr. Ganda Singh.translation: ਬਿਨਾਣ ਸ਼ੱਕ ਦੇੇ ਪਰਦੇ ਦੇ ਅੰਦਰ ਲੰਘ ਆ, ਇਸ ਸੰਗਤ ਵਿਚ ਕੋਈ ਓਪਰਾ ਨਹੀਣ ।

gurmukhi.Dr. Ganda Singh: ibguzr Az bygwngIhw E b^ud AwSnw sO [

Pritpal Singh Bindra.translation: I was burnt in that fire so much,

Dr. Ganda Singh.translation: ਤਾਤ ਪਰਾਈ ਨੂੰ ਛੱਡ ਕੇ ਆਪਣੇ ਆਪ ਨੂੰ ਜਾਣ,

gurmukhi.Dr. Ganda Singh: hr ik bw Kud AwSnw Sud Az ^udw bygwnw nIsq [10[2[

Pritpal Singh Bindra.translation:
That anyone who heard about this got burnt too like a pine tree." (14) (2)
I am not the only one who was putrefied in the fire of love,
Rather, the entire world was burnt down with this spark." (14) (3)

Dr. Ganda Singh.translation: ਜੋ ਭੀ ਆਪਣੇ ਆਪ ਨੂੰ ਜਾਣ ਲੈਣਦਾ ਹੈ, ੳਹੁ ਰੱਬ ਤੋਣ ਓਪਰਾ ਨਹੀਣ ਹੈ ।

gurmukhi.Dr. Ganda Singh: SOik mOlw hr ik rw bwSd hmwx swihb-idl Asq [

Pritpal Singh Bindra.translation: To get burnt in the 'flames of separation' of one's beloved,

Dr. Ganda Singh.translation: ਜਿਸ ਕਿਸੇ ਨੂੰ ਰੱਬ ਦੀ ਚਾਹ ਹੈ, ਉਹੀ ਦਿਲ ਦਾ ਸਾਹਿਬ ਹੈ,

gurmukhi.Dr. Ganda Singh: kwir hr dwnw nw bwSd, kwir hr dIvwnw nIsq [10[3[

Pritpal Singh Bindra.translation: Is like alchemy, substance that turns any metal into gold, getting minced (burnt) in fire into ashes. (14) (4)

Dr. Ganda Singh.translation: ਇਹ ਕੰੰਮ ਨਾ ਹਰ ਕਿਸੇ ਚਾਤਰ ਦਾ ਹੈ, ਅਤੇ ਨਾ ਹੀ ਕਿਸੇ ਦੀਵਾਨੇ ਦਾ ਹੈ ।

gurmukhi.Dr. Ganda Singh: nwshw qw cMd goeI ik¤swhwie vwAzo pMd [

Pritpal Singh Bindra.translation: Blessed is the heart of Goyaa

Dr. Ganda Singh.translation: ਹੇ ਨਸੀਹਤ ਕਰਨ ਵਾਲੇ# ਤੂੰ ਕਦ ਤਕ ਨਸੀਹਤਾਣ ਦੇ ਕਿੱਸੇ ਸੁਣਾਣਦਾ ਰਹੇਣਗਾ #

gurmukhi.Dr. Ganda Singh: bzim msqwn Asq jwie, ik¤sw E A&swnw nIsq [10[4[

Pritpal Singh Bindra.translation: That it got reduced to ashes only in the expectation of a glimpse of the face of his beloved. (14) (5)

Dr. Ganda Singh.translation: ਇਹ ਤਾਣ ਮਸਤ ਰਿੰਦਾਣ ਦੀ ਮਜਲਿਸ ਹੈ, ਕੋਈ ਕਿੱਸੇ ਕਹਾਣੀਆਣ ਦੀ ਥਾਣ ਨਹੀਣ ।

gurmukhi.Dr. Ganda Singh: eIx mqwie h¤k b-pyiS swihbwin-idl bvd [

Pritpal Singh Bindra.translation: Would some one please shield me from (the glare) of his imbued ravishing eyes,

Dr. Ganda Singh.translation: ਇਹ ਰੱਬੀ ਖ਼ਜ਼ਾਨਾ ਦਿਲਾਣ ਦਿਆਣ ਮਾਲਕਾਂ ਕੋਲ ਹੀ ਹੁੰਦਾ ਹੈ ।

gurmukhi.Dr. Ganda Singh: cUM b-sihrw mIrvI dr goSwie vIrwnw nIsq [10[5[

Pritpal Singh Bindra.translation: And, protect me from his sugar cubes-chewing mouth and lips. (15) (1)

Dr. Ganda Singh.translation: ਤੂੰ ਬੀਆਬਾਨਾਣ ਵਿਚ ਕਿਉਣ ਜਾਂਦਾ ਹੈੈਣ # ਉਹ ਉਜਾੜ ਦੇ ਖੂੰਜਿਆਣ ਵਿਚ ਨਹੀਣ ।

gurmukhi.Dr. Ganda Singh: eIN mqwie SOk rw Az AwSkwin h¤k b^wh [

Pritpal Singh Bindra.translation: I regret that moment that passed purposelessly,

Dr. Ganda Singh.translation: ਇਸ ਸ਼ੌਕ ਦੇ ਖ਼ਜ਼ਾਨੇ ਨੂੰ ਰੱਬ ਦੇ ਪਿਆਰਿਆਣ ਪਾਸੋਣ ਮੰਗ ।

gurmukhi.Dr. Ganda Singh: jwx ik dr zwnS b-juz nkiS rui^ jwnw nIsq [10[6[

Pritpal Singh Bindra.translation:
I also regret my carelessness, and my negligence to let the opportunity to slip by." (15) (2)
My heart and soul are frustrated and grieved at the spat on account of blasphemy and religion
I would look for anyone who would save me at the door of the abode of Akaalpurakh.(Would someone save me when I have brought a plea at the door of the Creator.)' (15) (3)
Playful, sportive and arrogant so called lovers have looted and conned the world.
I am crying for mercy that I, too, have been exploited by them and are begging so that someone would please save me." (15) (4)

Dr. Ganda Singh.translation: ਕਿਉਣਜੋ ਉਨ੍ਹਾਣ ਦੀ ਜਾਨ ਵਿਚ ਸਿਵਾਇ (ਵਾਹਿਗੁਰੂ)ਦੇ ਮੁਖੜੇ ਦੇ ਨਕਸ਼ਾਣ ਦੇ ਹੋਰ ਕੁਝ ਵੀ ਨਹੀਣ ।

gurmukhi.Dr. Ganda Singh: cMd mI-goeI qU AY goXw ^muS So zIx s^un [

Pritpal Singh Bindra.translation: How can Goyaa keep quiet from the dagger-like eyelids of the Master Guru;

Dr. Ganda Singh.translation: ਕਦ ਤਕ ਤੂੰ ਇਸ ਤਰ੍ਹਾਣ ਕਹਿੰਦਾ ਰਹੇਣਗਾ, ਐ ਗੋਯਾ# ਆਜਿਹੀਆਣ ਗੱਲਾਣ ਤੋਣ ਚੁਪ ਧਾਰ ।

gurmukhi.Dr. Ganda Singh: SOik mOlw munhisr br kwAbw E buq^wnw nIsq [10[7[

Pritpal Singh Bindra.translation:
I am still yelling for help. Someone would kindly save me." (15) (5)
Just as a drunk is only looking for and is concerned with a wine glass with ruby-colored drink (wine or alcohol),
Similarly, a thirsty person needs a glass of cold sweet water to quench his thirst, a glass of wine is not relevant. (16) (1)
The company of the devotees of Akaalpurakh is saturated with radiance;
This is all the association that the seekers of Waaheguru really need. (16) (2)
One can make this world a beautiful garden with one's smile,
Why would one need a gardener, after he had a glimpse of heavenly Him?(16) (3)
One of your loving and affectionate glances is enough to take away my breath,
But, still, I plead before Him for mercy and this is what I need the most. (16) (4)
Goyaa is addressing the Guru: "I have no one else but you in both the worlds.

Dr. Ganda Singh.translation: ਰੱਬ ਦੇ ਸ਼ੌਕ ਦਾ ਆਧਾਰ ਕਾਅਬੇ ਜਾਣ ਮੰਦਰ ਤੇ ਨਹੀਣ ਹੈ ।
